sentences.en: A chemist can analyze water into two colorless gases, hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.cn: 化学家能将水分解成无色气体氢和氧.

sentences.en: Actually, the natural flavor essences and the chemicals they contain are colorless.
sentences.cn: 事实上它们所含的天然香精与化学物质都是无色的.

sentences.en: Arsine is a colorless, poisonous gas that requires careful handling.
sentences.cn: 胂是一种无色的有毒的气体需要小心地对待.

sentences.en: As a colorless, sweet-smelling liquid, DCA is used in the production of plastics.
sentences.cn: 作为一种无色、带着甜蜜香味的液体，常被用于塑料生产。

sentences.en: At first glance, calcite might be confused with quartz where both are clear, colorless, and " glassy ".
sentences.cn: 乍一看来, 方解石可能与石英相混淆,因为两者都是透明 、 无色 、 且 “ 呈玻璃状 ” 的.

sentences.en: His complexion was colorless and he hadn't shaved.
sentences.cn: 他面无血色，胡子也没刮。

sentences.en: His face was wasted and colorless.
sentences.cn: 他的面孔是憔悴的,毫无血色.

sentences.en: His lips were colorless, his teeth looked yellowish.
sentences.cn: 他的双唇毫无血色, 两排牙齿也呈现黄色.

sentences.en: I know table salt is white, but that is because you have power and you have multiple surfaces scattering, but a large crystal of sodium chloride is clear and colorless.
sentences.cn: 我知道食用盐是白色的，但这是因为你让它成了粉末,因为有了多个散射面，但是一个大的氯化钠晶体,是无色透明的。

sentences.en: Install a CO detector to alert you of the presence of the deadly, odorless, colorless gas.
sentences.cn: 安装一氧化碳检测器来警告是否存在这种致命的、无色无味的气体。

sentences.en: It exists in this world colorless, shapeless, soundless, odorless, and painless.
sentences.cn: 它存在于世,无色, 无形, 无声, 无嗅和无痛.

sentences.en: Ouzo [ colorless liqueur flavored with anise seed | Greek ]
The colorless platelets were filtered washed with cold methanol.
sentences.cn: 将无色的小片状物过滤出来,用冷的甲醇洗涤.

sentences.en: The colorless protein aggregation was obtained from pig plasma using coagulant.
sentences.cn: 使用凝聚剂从猪血浆蛋白质中获得无色蛋白胶.

sentences.en: The transparent colorless variety of quartz is still known as rock crystal.
sentences.cn: 石英透明无色的品种仍然为人所知当岩石水晶.

sentences.en: The voice was flat and colorless.
This colorless gas is called oxygen, in which fires burn much better.
sentences.cn: 这种无色的气体叫氧气, 火在氧气里燃烧剧烈.

sentences.en: Translated Description : colorless optical glass, colored glass, with neutral optical glass.
sentences.cn: 生产各种规格无色光学玻璃, 有色光学玻璃, 含中性光学玻璃.

words.tran_cn: 有色的；着色的；有色人种的
华美的；有趣的；富有色彩的
鲜艳的；生动的；富色彩的；富有趣味的
无色的；不生动的；颜色黯淡的
着色；着色剂；配色；天然色；外貌
把...染色，粉饰，脸红（color的过去时和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 无色的，苍白的，颜色黯淡的，无特色的
